mapper.sql: id, product_id, item_sku_id, shop_id, city_id, city_name, user_id, product_name, user_name, phone, car_prices, activity_deposit, activity_discount, buy_count, order_status, create_time, expire_time, pay_id, pay_time, pay_amount, cancel_time, coupon_destroy_time, coupon_code, coupon_expire_time
mapper.select:
select
from c_order where id > #{id} and id < #{id} + 101
mapper.insert: insert into c_order (id, product_id, item_sku_id, shop_id, city_id, city_name, user_id, product_name, user_name, phone, car_prices, activity_deposit, activity_discount, buy_count, order_status, create_time, expire_time, pay_id, pay_time, pay_amount, cancel_time, coupon_destroy_time, coupon_code, coupon_expire_time ) values (#{id}, #{productId}, #{itemSkuId}, #{shopId}, #{cityId}, #{cityName}, #{userId}, #{productName}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{carPrices}, #{activityDeposit}, #{activityDiscount}, #{buyCount}, #{orderStatus}, #{createTime}, #{expireTime}, #{payId}, #{payTime}, #{payAmount}, #{cancelTime}, #{couponDestroyTime}, #{couponCode}, #{couponExpireTime} )

update c_order
product_id = #{productId},
item_sku_id = #{itemSkuId},
shop_id = #{shopId},
city_id = #{cityId},
city_name = #{cityName},
user_id = #{userId},

update c_order set product_id = #{productId}, item_sku_id = #{itemSkuId}, shop_id = #{shopId}, city_id = #{cityId}, city_name = #{cityName}, user_id = #{userId}, product_name = #{productName}, user_name = #{userName}, phone = #{phone}, car_prices = #{carPrices}, activity_deposit = #{activityDeposit}, activity_discount = #{activityDiscount}, buy_count = #{buyCount}, order_status = #{orderStatus}, create_time = #{createTime}, expire_time = #{expireTime}, pay_id = #{payId}, pay_time = #{payTime}, pay_amount = #{payAmount}, cancel_time = #{cancelTime}, coupon_destroy_time = #{couponDestroyTime}, coupon_code = #{couponCode}, coupon_expire_time = #{couponExpireTime} where id = #{id}
